batchDelete: <input class='btn btn-danger pull-left' type='button' value='Delete Selected' ng-click='$ctrl.deleteMultipleRows(viewObj)' ng-show='viewObj.displayBatch' />
batchToggle: <input class='btn btn-warning pull-left' type='button' value='Toggle Selected' ng-click='$ctrl.toggleMultipleRows(viewObj)' ng-show='viewObj.displayBatch' />
batchUpdate: <input class='btn btn-success pull-left' type='button' value='Update Selected' ng-click='$ctrl.updateMultipleRows(viewObj)' ng-show='viewObj.displayBatch' />
